app.name: Wii64 | glN64 GFX | WiiVC
app.long_description:
Wii64 Team is: Core Coder - tehpola Graphics & Menu Coding - sepp256 General Coding - emu_kidid
The Wii64Team proudly presents Wii64 Beta 1.3 (WiiVC version with glN64 GFX Plugin) Wii64 is a port of Mupen64 0.5 to the Wii/GameCube
This specific version is for the Wii VC mode on Wii U specifically. See the guide on how to properly run this.
It currently runs most games at full speed or close to it, there are some known graphical and/or core issues. Please see the enclosed README and visit https://github.com/emukidid/Wii64 to report issues, or to check out the latest progress.
Special Thanks to: Extrems - Not64 drmr - Graphics marshallh - Wii64 Demo ROM wiibrew - wiki & forums shagkur/WinterMute - libogc/devkitPPC Team Twiizers for Wii homebrew
Wii64 and the Wii64 logo are trademarks of the Wii64 Team and should not be used in unofficial builds.
